plugin.name: yang_comparator
plugin.description: a plugin for comparing two yang schema.

parameter.name: compare-type
parameter.description: mandatory, specify compare-type, one of stmt,tree,or compatible-check

parameter.name: rule
parameter.description: optional, specify the path of compatible-rule file.

parameter.name: result
parameter.description: mandatory, specify the compare result file path, the result file is a xml format.
